marklogic.body: Great read. I have a question. As far as the two groups studied (one that used artificial sweeteners and one that didn't), is it possible that the group that used these sweeteners weight not simply because they used these sweeteners but also because people who used artificial sweeteners are also those that may be more highly inclined to buy foods like , under eat for a week to then over eat or binge on a weekend, order a salad but cover it in dressing or engage in a variety of other behaviors that, unknowingly to them, would also promote weight Gain?
